post:
**"Money Saved is Money Earned"...to prove this once again, Breezehost brings you a COOL OFFER, which is as follows:**

We're proud to announce our ATTRACTIVE PRICING on VPS with Massive Upgrades. BREEZEHOST is elated to deliver its excellent services at the most affordable prices that you won’t be able to overlook!

**"A Class" Support**
Our support team is lightning speed to help you at all times if you have a managed service. Our team is fully trained with years of experience to help you along your way to building your perfect website. We have specialized personnel to offer our customers reliable support and service throughout your hosting experience. Enjoy the maximum support to help you site exceed your expectations.

> On VPS  EARN 15% for 1st SIX months on our Unmanaged VPS & EARN 20% + UNMETERED Bandwidth for the 1st three months on our Managed VPS (_Server Locations US and NL_). 

To know more about the most affordable dedicated servers with revised features, that Breezehost is offering for a very LIMITED TIME...do have a visit at our [breezehost.net](www.breezehost.net), before the opportunity vanishes away!!! 
________________________________________

**BreezeHost's VPS Plans include...**

• Equal CPU Share
• SolusVM Control Panel
• OpenVZ Technology
• FULL Root Access
• TUN/TAP Enabled by default
• Multiple Linux OS Choices
• Free Website Transfer
• Instant Setup
• 100 mbps Port Speed

**Our Dedicated Plans include…**

• Fully Managed Service:
• Enterprise Quality Hardware:
• Parallels Plesk Panel or Direct Admin Panel or Cpanel/WHM Control panel:
• 100mbps Port Uplink Speed GUARANTEED!
• 15Min Guaranteed Response
• SSH/RDP Access:
• 24x7 Reliable Supports: 
• No Hidden Charges 

And much more... 

________________________________________

At Breezehost, we have put in place, unique systems and structures that allow us to give our lovable clients...high quality VPS hosting without the high price.

When you sign up for our VPS hosting, we are very proud to offer you the following exciting services:

• Stable And Reliable Servers Using Newest Technology
• VPS Control Panel In the event you need to reinstall, restart, or console your VPS you may do so at your convenience in the VPS Control Panel.
• 99.99% Uptime Guarantee ( Our servers are always on, everyday, all day, guaranteed.
• Instant Setup after payment confirmation
• No Contracts In the very rare instance that you would want to host elsewhere you can cancel your account at any time.
• RAID Protected Storage Our servers RAID hard drive technology. This technology enables your sites to be stored on two hard drives at the same time. Should one fail, the other hard drive will continue to serve your sites/applications, and there will zero down time just like nothing even happened.

**Limited offer sign up TODAY…**
